subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=[[묘]]|eumhun=|rv=myo|mr=myo|y=myo}} <ref>The radical [[金]] suggests an anchor made of iron.</ref>
[[Image:Kotwica SS Poznań.JPG|thumb|right| [[땅]]에 [[닿다|닿]]은 [[닻]] ([[anchor]])]]

# ([[닻]]): [[anchor]]

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{l|ko|碇}} (정, ''jeong'') <ref>The radical [[石]] suggests an anchor made of stone.</ref>
* {{l|ko|椗}} (정, ''jeong'') <ref>The radical [[木]] suggests an anchor made of wood.</ref>
